workshoptitle: Load and Analyze Your Data in Oracle Autonomous Database

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Load Data from Object Storage Public Buckets
tutorials.description: Load customer contact, movie genre, customer sales and pizza location data into ADB from public object storage buckets using the Database Tools

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Load Data from Local Files
tutorials.description: Load additional customer details into ADB from local files using the Database Actions tools

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Develop Self-Service Analytics Cloud Dashboards
tutorials.description: Use Analytics Cloud for interactive dashboards

tutorials.title: Lab 5 (optional): Load and Analyze JSON Data
tutorials.description: Load JSON collections about movies using the DBMS_CLOUD package and analyze that data using SQL

tutorials.title: Lab 6 (optional): Load and Analyze the News from REST Endpoints
tutorials.description: Load news and analyze the sentiment about actors from the newsapi.org

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Terminate your Autonomous Database instance
tutorials.description: Free up some resources by terminating your instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 9 (optional): Create Data Pipelines for Continuous Data Import and Export
tutorials.description: Create Oracle Data Pipelines for continuous data import and export

tutorials.title: Oracle CloudWorld 2022 - Get Help
tutorials.description: Everything you need to know to get started
